body.p: Saemien boktsaavh leah naemhtie mïerhkesjamme orange duekie. The keys with Sámi letters have their original letter available via AltGr: press AltGr + the sámi letter to get the letter that has been replaced with a Sámi one.
Vuesiehtæmman: Gosse daaroen ø, diedtieh dellie AltGr + ö.
Gaajhkh dah jeatjah bokstaavh jïh væhtah leah seamma sijjesne goh daaroen båaloebuertesne.
